TheSikkimstateschemeportalisaimedatasing.1: The ‘Sikkim state scheme portal’ is aimed at a single point of access to all the schemes offered by the Government of Sikkim through its constituent departments. We provide access to current, complete, and accurate information related to all the schemes provided by the government.We here provide a platform to the citizens where they can view all the schemes offered by the government and those for which they are eligible. In times of COVID-19 pandemic, we bring forth a hassle-free process to apply for the schemes (under whose eligibility criteria you fall) while staying safe at home.

This scheme is meant for workers in unor: This scheme is meant for workers in unorganised sector such as maids, drivers and so on whose monthly income does not exceed Rs 15,000. Under the scheme, pension of Rs 3000 per month will be given to eligible subscribers.

Under this scholarship scheme, amount of.1: Under this scholarship scheme, amount of 30000 is disbursed among meritorious girl student for pursuing technical education.Two girls per family are eligible to apply for this scholarship.

The Mukhya Mantri Sishu Suraksha Yojana.1: The Mukhya Mantri Sishu Suraksha Yojana Avam Sutkeri Shayog Yojana

The Mukhya Mantri Sishu Suraksha Yojana Avam Sutkeri Shayog Yojana has been specifically designed to ensure that every pregnant women of BPL family during delivery receives a cash assistance of Rs.3000/- to enable her to access better health care, good nutrition and also take good care of the new born.

The Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana was la.1: The Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana was launched for providing clean fuel to women below the poverty line.

In this scheme all excluding government.1: In this scheme all excluding government servants and their dependent are entitled to cash/cashless treatment benefit up to Rs.2.00 lakhs maximum depending on the category of illness and BPL patient are entitled up to Rs.1.5 lakhs. In order to make treatment of referred patients easy and quick, a number of good hospitals in the country have been empanelled so that our patient do not have to spend time in the corridor of Government hospitals.

The PM Garib Kalyan Package will help th.1: The PM Garib Kalyan Package will help the Wage-earners who are earning below Rs. 15,000 per month. Under this scheme everyone will get 5 kg of wheat/rice for free of whatever they are already getting.

The scholarship is only open for student.1: The scholarship is only open for students with disability. The level of disability should be less than 40%.

This scheme is for rape and acid attack.1: This scheme is for rape and acid attack victims. Financial assitance of upto 10 lakhs is provided to them.

The State Government launched the Chief.1: The State Government launched the Chief Minister’s Free Scholarship Scheme with the aim of providing free scholarship to meritorious and needy students. The scholarship is granted annually to a candidate from the BPL category.The scholarship aims to cover course fees, hostel/accommodation charges, books, stationaries and to & from travelling charges once a year from the institute to the home country

Post Matric Scholarship for EBC Student.1: Post Matric Scholarship for EBC Student

Service for availing Scholarship for stu.1: Service for availing Scholarship for students belonging to communities including ST, SC, and OBC (Central) with annual family income below or equal to 1 Lakh

Under the scheme, 1 crore of the BPL( be.1: Under the scheme, 1 crore of the BPL( below poverty line) families covered under the targeted public distribution system are identified.
